chhotimaa: This breaks my heart, pinches empresas culeras 😣
donyah_dulce_: What the actual fuck... this takes human rights violations to a very visceral & visible level. Thank you for this undeniable reality of what it looks like to be a agricultural worker without rights...
pablitasan: I’m sickened by how this makes people feel pride. I feel rage. That corporations hold the lives of their workers in their hands. How laborers have to work in these conditions to keep their jobs, to keep providing for their families.
_ominous_cloud_: As always climate change effecting indigenous people the most. YT vegans need to donate some cash to farm workers ASAP.
sweetblackjesus: Im inside 20 hours out ofmost days and i cant breathe. This is horrible
jess.ramrz: as an organizer and advocate for farmworker justice I knew this was happening and here I am still in shock and awe with the photo that proves the continued commodification of our people in the mist of crisis. my heart breaks 🙏🏽🦋💗
